dispatch module¶

dispatch.create_list_of_stops(packages)[source]¶

Create a list of stops based on the destination of the packages. The runtime is O(n)

Parameters

packages (list) – Sorted list of packages

Returns

stop_list – A list of address IDs

Return type

list

dispatch.create_route(stop_list)[source]¶

Create the route for the truck to take to deliver packages. The runtime is O(n^2).

Parameters

stop_list (list) – A list of stops to visit

Returns

route – A list of the route for the truck to take

Return type

list

dispatch.determine_next_stop(current_location, stops)[source]¶

Create the route for the truck to take to deliver packages. The runtime is O(n).

Parameters

  • current_location (int) – the current location of truck

  • stops (list) – list of stops remaining

Returns

possible_stops – a dictionary of trips (key) and the distance of the trip (value)

Return type

dictionary
